name: Phase Congruency
description: Detects edges and features using phase congruency in the frequency domain. This illumination-invariant method reveals structural differences in AI content.
mechanism: Analyzes phase alignment across multiple frequency scales. Phase congruency highlights structural features invariant to illumination.
source: Morrone and Owens (1987), Pattern Recognition Letters
useCase: Detecting structural anomalies in AI-generated images
